title: Nebraska Firm Recalls Ground Beef Products Due To Possible E. Coli O157:H7 Contamination
summary: Editor's Note: (Dec 20, 2011): It is important to note that the recalled product may have been repackaged into consumer-size packages and sold under different retail brand names. WASHINGTON, Dec. 16, 2011 - Tyson Fresh Meats Inc., a Dakota City, Neb. establishment, is recalling approximately...
impacted_products: 10-pound chubs of "CHUCK FINE GROUND BEEF 80/20," packed in cases containing eight chubs.
